title: GMFB: That Feeling When...
itunes:title: GMFB: That Feeling When...
description:
On the #GMFB Podcast: The team comments on Nate’s eclectic coffee orders (:20) before revisiting Cris Collinsworth’s appearance on the show, where he got into: Honesty in broadcasting (1:43), Pro Football Focus and analytics in football (5:51), Twitter and reaction to fans (8:53) and advice to Tony Romo and Jay Cutler as they move from the field to the booth (10:32); Nate comments on his new gig at NFL Today and the team discusses their relationship with social media (12:00); A recap of Tampa Bay Buccaneers super fan Nick Carter of the Backstreet Boys joining the show (15:28) and being a self-aware superstar and huge football fan (18:12); The team breaks down their experience attending the Sports Emmys (20:38); Kyle recounts getting a bit nostalgic at martini time (27:20) How it is talking NFL in the offseason and finding ways to keep it fun (29:02); Nate discusses Josh Gordon (31:44) and finally, Kay gushes over her man-crush (34:51)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
